text:
"Acknowledging receipt of identity code. I see you, $playerName!"
OR
"Scanning completed, double checking registry…Hey there $playerName! What can we help you with?"

"You have been scanned and identified as not a threat. 
OR
"Your identity is known and checked against established registries. Any further action will be considered hostile."
OR
"This isn't the first time you shifty pirate bastards have tried this. Clear off or we'll be forced to attack."

"Hostile $shipOrFleet,  a partol fleet has been dispacted to deal with your incursion"
OR
"Hostile $shipOrFleet, be advised: our route is known and our absence will be noted. Cease all hostile activity and retreat."
The Hiver $personRank looks furiously defiant. "Your identity has been registered, monkey." $heOrShe says.
The enemy $personRank does not respond to your comm request and moves in to attack.
